home.description: I'm a frontend developer. React | Typescript

about.title: About Me
about.bio: Frontend Developer Intern with practical experience in building scalable web applications using ReactJS (TypeScript) and Angular within Agile environments. Skilled in component-based architecture, UI performance optimization, and responsive design. Aim to build advanced front-end development expertise through hands-on projects, with a clear goal of progressing into a Full-Stack Developer position supporting large-scale SaaS platforms.

resume.title: Resume
resume.bio: Junior Frontend Developer with a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Experienced in real-world web projects and always eager to learn and improve to contribute to modern web products.

location.title: University of Greenwich
location.address: Cong Hoa Street, Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

location.title: Vietnamese Standardized Test of English Proficiency (VSTEP)

list_item.title: Landing Page (Personal Project)

location.title1: Designed and developed a high-end interactive landing page for an education-focused product, emphasizing smooth animations, responsive layout, and premium UI/UX experience.
location.title2: Implemented advanced scroll-based navigation with active section tracking, smooth scrolling behavior, and animated underline indicators using IntersectionObserver and Framer Motion.
location.title3: Built custom cursor light-trail effects with SVG Bézier curves, real-time mouse tracking, and performance-optimized rendering to enhance visual engagement.

list_item.tech: Next.js, ReactJS, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, IntersectionObserver API

list_item.title: React UI Kit (Personal Project)

location.title1: Designed and built a reusable React UI Kit from scratch, focusing on scalability, consistency, and developer-friendly APIs for real-world application usage.
location.title2: Developed a set of core UI components including customizable Input, Table, Toast Notification, QR Code Generator, and QR Code with embedded image, supporting flexible props and theme-based styling.
location.title3: Ensured high code quality and usability by implementing TypeScript type safety, controlled/uncontrolled component patterns, accessibility considerations, and performance-optimized rendering.

list_item.tech: ReactJS, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Vite, QRCode Library

list_item.title: Internal Projects – Technology Apprenticeship Program (01/2025)

location.title1: Contributed to the development of 3 enterprise-level internal systems using ReactJS (TypeScript) and Angular within an Agile Scrum environment, enhancing workflow efficiency and user satisfaction through improved UI performance and reusable component architecture.
location.title2: Built 12+ reusable components, optimized rendering for 25% faster load times, and collaborated with backend teams on RESTful API integration.
location.title3: Applied Git flow, code review, and testing best practices in real-world SaaS development.

list_item.tech: ReactJS, TypeScript, Angular, REST API, GitLab, WebSocket, SignalR

list_item.title: University Magazine Website

location.title1: Collaborated in a 6-member Agile Scrum team to develop a university digital magazine platform.
location.title2: Designed and implemented responsive layouts and interactive features, enhancing content accessibility and user engagement by 15%.

list_item.tech: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 5, JavaScript, jQuery, C#

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.bio: If you're interested in collaboration, need technical support, or simply want to connect, don't hesitate to drop me a message. I'm always open and responsive!
